EmailTemplate.subject: Congratulations to Peko! Introducing Kraig Solomon, Univar USA
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
I want to share some exciting news with you: Peko Haidari has been promoted to Univar Customer Service Supervisor in San Jose! Please join me in congratulating Peko on this well-deserved promotion within Univar USA.
As such, I have the privilege of introducing myself as your new Univar Sales Representative. My name is Kraig Solomon, and just like Peko, I am only a phone call or email away Monday-Friday.
I will be calling you in the coming days/weeks to ensure that you continue to receive the A+ service you have experienced from Peko and Univar. I am looking forward to working with you. If you have an immediate need, please contact me anytime.
Sincerely,
Kraig Solomon Univar Sales Representative Desk: (866) 456-7148 Email: kraig.solomon@univarusa.com
